name: Fruity Fun - Juicy Arcade
description:
CATCH AS MANY FRUITS AS YOU CAN IN A COLOURFUL ACTION

Plenty of colourful action for you and your kids. Fruity Fun offers beautiful endless levels where you mix a fresh juice. Don’t miss any fruits and try to dodge hot pepper – you need only healthy ingredients in your blender. Four exciting levels with more coming soon, a lot of handy boosters, unique blenders – all in your hands.

The whole family can experience Fruity Fun’s updated levels with even more colours and more fruits. Check out our new Ice stage – you will fight heat to make the best icy smoothie. And don’t forget the new Eggnog blender!

Enjoy your fruity mix and have fun! It’s free!
